desc: Our large selection of knitting and crocheting yarns include Estelle, Cascade, King Cole, Urth, Colour Story, Louisa Harding, Noro, Juniper Moon, Ella Rae, Mirasol, KFI, Gedifra and more. Our knitting needles include Addi, ChiaoGoo, Brittany, Lykke and our crochet hooks are Knitters Pride.

layout.text:
We offer a wide selection of high quality yarns in a variety of colours and fibers that are sure to exceed your expectation. In addition, we also carry needles, hooks, patterns and notions.

We have a large variety of classes from beginner to the more advanced that will be sure to challenge even the most seasoned knitter.
